entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
